title: Yahoo! HackU
text:
Yahoo! HackU was a weekend hackathon event conducted annually by Yahoo in various universities across the World. HackU was a popular event among students due to its prizes and good food. The event was last organized in KGP during 28th Feburary to 3rd March 2013. [ 1 ]
The event was discontinued probably due to reduction in India wide operations by Yahoo and its eventual shutdown. [ 2 ]

The winners were: [ 3 ]
Winne r: Vipul Jain, Nadeem Anjum, Saurabh Agrawal, Devender Bindal for WikiGist
Runner Up : Rajanya Dhar, Sonam Kumari, Sunandita Patra, Anusha Suresh for Follower Circles
Second Runner Up : Shrey Sharma, Vikas Sahu, Aayush Goel, Vinodh Kumar Sunkara for Story Line
Hackers Choice award : Siddharth Rakesh, Arpit Kumar, Sachin Kumar, Yash Bajaj for Train QueRies . This was based on popular voting.

The winners were: [ 4 ]
• Kaushik, Anjani, Saurabh and Sumit for a YouTube playlist recommender
• Rahul, Subhro, Sanket and Amit for RailConnect an app to find train connectivity between any two different train stations on the basis of parameters like maximum buffer time.
• Vishwas, Tabassum, Debajit and Amit for QuickTweet-n-Mail a browser extension which lets you quickly tweet and email an interesting picture.
• Mogili, Mahesh, Maila and Bipin for HackingFood an app which can find you food recipes on the given the ingredients you have.

The winners were: [ 5 ]
• Shubham Agrawal, Rishav Agarwal, Ashish K Yadav and Naveen K Sharma for RailMapia which provides an easy to use interface to see different trains between two stations.
• Arpit Agarwal, Vikash Agarwal, Aditya Mangal and Rajanya Dhar for StockNetwork a tool for buying and selling using social dynamics.
• Aditya Barelia, Anshul Singhle, Umesh Kumar Sharma and Rohit Kumar for ssh-SMS a tool for controlling your computer through SMS
